name: Threadbare Red Plaid Shirt
data: It increases the users intelligence nicely.
It has mediocre armour class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration superbly.
It decreases the users physical resistance strongly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'stunning blow'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance unearthly.
